name: The Abettor's Letters
storyline: Agent Carsen Brooks is an American spy hired by a mysterious party to investigate a criminal conspiracy taking place in France. As you play, you’ll learn French to blend in with the locals and to decipher the clues embedded in their French conversations with you. You’ll need these clues to solve the mystery in each level and thwart the villains in time.
summary: A point-and-click role playing adventure game for the iPad who never saw the light of day thanks to an unsuccessful Kickstarter.
